website_summaries.verdict: An attractive living room floor lamp that is versatile and bright, with an adjustable 3-way switch that turns on torchiere, reading light, or both.
pros: We like that is includes both a main floor light and a side reading light, so it is versatile enough for any use
This lamp also stands out for its longevity
users that have had the lamp over a year report still being satisfied with its functionality
cons: Some consumers reported receiving lamps with missing pieces, and it can take a little time to adjust the screws

customer_reviews.title: Here's how to avoid stripping the threads
customer_reviews.text: It's great for the price. The secret to threading the pole segments together without stripping the threads is to (1) lubricate both the male and female threads with anything handy (I used silicone grease); and (2) to CAREFULLY line the segments up, then WITHOUT FORCING (I used gravity), screw the segments together. Stop and back up if there is any resistance at all. Everything came together tight and straight. It is cheaply made, but if put together carefully, the end product is solid and looks just fine.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Worth buying! Great product for the price. I assembled two of them myself (32 year old woman) and it took me maybe 30 minutes or so to do. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Hadassa

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure why some reviews said that this ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why some reviews said that this lamp was difficult to assemble. If anything, it was harder to get out of the box than it was to put together! It took me about fifteen minutes to assemble and that was because I was watching tv while doing it! The lamp itself is very heavy duty and even comes with the small light bulb! If needed, I would buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Angie P.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy enough to install and unlike a lot of others ...
customer_reviews.text: I may have received a product which had been previously replaced. The small glass cover was broken. There were no instructions in the package and it generally seemed to have been opened. Not worth the effort of returning it. It was easy enough to install and unlike a lot of others I had no problems with cross threading. Assembled in 5 minutes. Seems sturdy and a generally nice lamp but seems like a lot of the lamp shades get broken. I would buy this lamp again from a store, but not from Amazon. repacking and reshipping is too much of a pain and the chances of the shades being broken in transit or elsewhere seems uncommonly high.
customer_reviews.author: WebPoet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, attractive lamp. It does come with one E12 (candelabra) bulb for the side light but you'll need to buy a bulb for the main light. The product description on Amazon says the main fixture takes a 100 watt bulb, but the instructions that came with the lamp says you can use a 150 watt bulb. We purchased a 100 watt soft white LED bulb and that is plenty bright. There is a four way switch - either off, reading light, main light, or both reading and main light. It came packaged very well and made it to Alaska unscathed. Very easy to assemble. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska shopper

customer_reviews.title: dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product one star because I ordered a brand new one and received a box that was duct taped and some of the items were in zip lock sandwich bags. One of the wires was disconnected, thank heavens my husband is good with wiring and was able to fix it, I really didn't want to box it back up and send it back. I buy a lot from amazon, but I'm very disappointed that i received a product that was previously opened and returned because it didn't work. :(
customer_reviews.author: Debbie01

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a few cheap fetures.
customer_reviews.text: The arm for the reading lamp does not really attach to the stem securely. It just kind of hangs in the hole by a very small hook. It stays in place until you touch it or move the lamp. To secure it i used a couple small zip ties. Also this only has one switch for both lights and its on the top light. So if you are sitting in a chair and need the reading light on, you need to stand up and turn the knob several times the get the correct combination of lights on or off. It's too bad because this is a really solid lamp and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: PBaller

customer_reviews.title: This product was great at first
customer_reviews.text: This product was great at first... Until I tried turning it on. A pop and spark occurred immediately and now it doesn't work at all, even with fresh bulbs. I already threw out the packaging (assembled it in a different place and it looked great - I had no reason to suspect faulty or dangerous construction/wiring) so returning would not make sense after the expense of re-packaging such a delicate item. No way to contact the seller. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great looking light
customer_reviews.text: Great looking light! Love it! Highly recommend and would buy again! Pros: Quick and easy assembly. Took less than 10 minutes to put it together! Considerations: Unlike the base and the accented pieces on top, the stand is or is closer to a black appearance instead of a uniform dark-bronze painted finish. It isn't very noticeable or distracting, but was enough for me to remove 1 star. It seems odd to me that the color doesn't match throughout the piece. I also would have really enjoyed if an optional extension piece was given to vary the height of the lamp. While the advertised height is correct, after putting it together, a few inches were certainly more desired.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Fettel

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY DISATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: I got an Amazon gift card for Christmas and was specifically told not to buy things for the kids only for myself.... So this is what happened when I did just that: Product arrived and appeared to be new in the box but upon opening the layers of boxes, tape and styrofoam, the base was dirty and scratched up like it had been used outside and then the pieces wouldn't go together. The base and first pole didn't have the parts to screw together. So now I have a broken and filthy lamp that I could never repackage and return. Quite the dirty trick on behalf of the seller. VERY DISAPPOINTING, think I'll stick to buying for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Very cheaply made. When everything was tightened it leaned like the tower of Piza. I had to bend it quite a bit at the base to get it straight. It's referred to as dark bronze but is actually black. The metal leaf pieces don't fit well. If I hadn't mangled the box getting it out, I would send it back. I will cut my losses and donate it to the Salvation Army.
customer_reviews.author: SnoopTess

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice looking
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered two of these for our family room. I had to put them together. Get a recycle bag when you open the box, because these things are packed in a box inside a box inside a box. Because of this packing, there were no visible damages or scratches to the lamps when I unpacked them. There is an included tool for screwing on the lampshade on the smaller, flexible, part - VERY GLAD that was there. My big ole sausage fingers would not fit into that tiny cup to screw the plastic nut in without it. Good design, solid and heavy. Screw slowly so you don't misread the shaft.
customer_reviews.author: FANLig

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, if they send one that isn't defective.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp looks great! My reason for 4-stars is the first lamp they sent, one of the segments screwed on crooked so I had to send it back for one that wasn't defective. The packaging is tricky too. I almost broke the shade because you pull the Styrofoam out of the box and the base and post segments are on one side of the Styrofoam then the cord wraps around to the back where the shades are loosely in place on the back. Luckily the top sconce is thick glass, but it has a shattered effect so I thought I broke it when it fell off of my desk! Luckily everything was intact and the lamp looks amazing. :)
customer_reviews.author: Anna O.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: If I had bought these (I got 2) in a local store I would have returned them. Poles are aluminum, so you have to be careful when screwing together or they will strip out. The switch on one lamp is on the front, which is handy. On the other lamp it's on the back, which is a bother. If you want to change the setting, you have to get up from your seat and kneel on your chair or stand up to change the setting. I would never buy these again, nor would I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was in a hurry and didn't follow my usual rule of reading the 1-star reviews before ordering. Big mistake! As noted by many others, the pole segments won't screw together completely without stripping the threads, and also one of the joints is misaligned, leaving the pole with a bend in the middle. Also as noted by others, the styrofoam packaging was crumbling and sloppily taped together, suggesting the lamp was previously returned. Which I will also do.
customer_reviews.author: unacoder

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness & Functionality Lacking
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this lamp but it lacks sturdiness and functionality. Why would someone design a lamp with a reading lamp function and put the ONLY switch at the top five feet off the floor whereit cannot be reached from a sitting position? In addition, the joints where it screws together are so flimsy that the lamp regularly appears to lean requiring the joints to be screwed back together. Doing that becomes an exercise in frustration! I think that the inside threads are so shallow that they are difficult to match with the coarser outside threads. If you don't mind crooked lamps or frequent frustration this lamp is attractive. Otherwise, don't bother!
customer_reviews.author: Trish87109Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Customer Service -- Please help!
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically, this lamp is great. But our package was missing the small socket ring for the smaller reading light. Without this little plastic piece, the reading lamp will not stay on. I contacted Amazon, via a submission function, but received a boiler plate "non-response". I have tried to talk to someone at Amazon since a missing part is not a standard check-the-box complaint. No success. I subsequently had a electrician try to order the part but he could not find it; instead, he jerry-rigged a solution which promptly fell apart as the lighted heated up. I feel set adrift by Amazon! All we need is small plastic piece so that this lovely lamp will work. Can you help us?
customer_reviews.author: Hard to Please

customer_reviews.title: The packaging looked like it was a cheap lamp you would find at ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I was irritated because this was black not brushed bronze as stated. The packaging looked like it was a cheap lamp you would find at Walmart. After putting it together I realized it was very sturdy and heavy overall a good lamp. I now really like it after a day of trying it out and canceled my return. Great lamp but keep in mind it is a black lamp base.
customer_reviews.author: Della Crum

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: After reading the review where AmylNite "TuneHead" said "though the on-off switch is at the top of the lamp, there is a separate switch on the cord that I can keep by my side, thus allowing for changing, turning on, or turning off, from my recliner." I knew for sure this was the lamp I wanted, however, if there was this separate switch, it is there no longer and it makes it very inconvenient for me. Although this is a nice looking lamp I definitely would not purchase it again. I'm thinking of having it rewired so switch is in the middle of the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Parish

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Real glass shades and a well weighted base that is stable on my carpet. Easily assembled by myself in about 5 minutes. Extremely well packaged. I would have liked an off-white shade, but this frosted / marbled looking white shade actually allows more illumination, which was what I needed. It's a really nice looking lamp and the small bulb that was included for the goose neck reading lamp puts out a surprising amount of direct light..
customer_reviews.author: Elle Reard

customer_reviews.title: Wonky
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp because my parents had one at their house and I really liked it. I like the style of lamp, but mine is lopsided. Super, noticeably, lopsided. The base is completely uneven and there’s no way to fix it. We are keeping this jacked up lamp because my husband has to destroy the box it came in to get everything out. So. Here we are.
customer_reviews.author: JNA

customer_reviews.title: I Like the look
customer_reviews.text: I Like the look, and the amount of light it puts out is OK (could be better), but the real frustration is the placement of the light switch. Someone made a comment in these reviews when I was looking to purchase this and thought it would be no big deal, but I actually do find it annoying. If you are sitting down reading, you can't reach the switch, and it's placed right underneath the top lamp, so it's just not that convenient. Still for the look, price and the fact that these are quite solid, it's a small sacrifice.
customer_reviews.author: GoJo

customer_reviews.title: I like lights this style which I tried last year
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I like lights this style which I tried last year. That's why I bought 5 more this time. Unfortunately, there is a part missing in 1 of 5 lights I bought this time which is part of smaller part of the light including the glass and metal part. I leave the same message on package feedback but I guess you may not able to see that. Please see the picture I cropped. Can you please send me this part? Thank a lot. Best, Austin Thanks a lot for sending me the replacement so quickly. The new one works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: The switch would be better if it was down by the reading light
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged, but the small reading light is too bright with the blub that is included, and it gets very hot. The switch is way up by the top light, making it difficult to reach if you're short. The switch would be better if it was down by the reading light. The base I received is very uneven and wobbles. I had to put felt pads on it to stabilize. The plastic underside of the base seems to have not been molded correctly and it looks like someone tried to add more plastic to fix it, but failed. I'm giving this 3 stars because it does look pretty and works.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: The lamp arrived in good condition. The packing was very good done
customer_reviews.text: The lamp arrived in good condition. The packing was very good done! Parts and shade shell did fit together. We sssembled it in 20 minutes. It was succedted to use a 150 w light bulb . But a 100 w bulb works fine. The side arm or reading lamp had a light bulb included. The light is very bright. Most of the time, i have the reading light on . The main light has a nice, golden hlow to it. I love my torch lamp.
customer_reviews.author: mobile woman

customer_reviews.title: One was wonderful, the other not
customer_reviews.text: The lamps are nice. The lower one uses special small light bulbs. The first one I put together was difficult. I have not yet figured out what's wrong with the upper light bulb holder. It is loose. I was amazed when I assembled the second one, and the pole screwed in solidly and the light fixture had a solid place to screw in the fixture. The 150 watt bulbs make it amazing for lighting the whole area. I don't want to have to return the other lamp. I feel like someone else had returned it and they just repackaged it and sent it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid and heavy, doesn't feel cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are great (I bought 2). Like other reviewers mention, they are very heavy. Makes me feel safer that they won't tip over as easily. The small light IS a different type of bulb; the candelabra size. So you can't just replace it with a regular light bulb, it won't screw in. This DOES come with a small light bulb, but it's incandescent so we replaced it. The only minor issue is with one of the lamp posts, one of the sections looks very slightly crooked. Not enough that I'm concerned. I tried and retried threading it differently but still turns out slightly off.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Lamp terrific; packing problematic
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is terrific. Assembles quite easily; base and pole nicely weighted. Looks better that photos. BUT it's packed in that styrofoam and lots of tape. The packing falls apart and sticks to everything. Takes long time to clean up. Use a drop cloth to assemble the lamp or outside.
customer_reviews.author: John O'G

customer_reviews.title: These lights are PERFECT! Putting them both together was easy - However
customer_reviews.text: These lights are PERFECT! Putting them both together was easy - However, my only complaint is that one tilts a bit. All the pieces are screwed in but it seems like the base of the pole won't stay secure. I had to glue it so it would stop leaning to the right/left. Still giving 5 stars because of the look of these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Chauxes

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-purpose light
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp! Looks great. Two lights, one for brighter light in living room, small light for softer light in evenings relaxing and enjoying reading a book, family night watching a movie, relaxing with spouse drinking wine, etc. Great multi purpose light.
customer_reviews.author: Clare ~ TX

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe and unattractive
customer_reviews.text: My main complain about the lamp, and the reason it will be returned, is that the pole is at an angle, and the base is completely unstable (rocks all over the place). I moved it to several places in order to confirm that it was not an uneven floor. Additionally, the color of the lamp appears very different than pictured. It is jet black except for a few small areas of bronze detail. In the picture, it appears the whole lamp is a uniform color. See attached picture for the true color.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Improper Description
customer_reviews.text: Lamp as such was ok. Packaging was pretty bad. Also another detail that is not mentioned in the description is that only the main socket is a standard E26 socket. The side lamp socket is an E12 socket. I bought standard E26 base LED bulbs for both sockets only to realize that this crucial detail was missed in the description. Now I either have to buy an adapter or make do with the crappy side bulb provided.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: High quality, heavy, gonna last for years!
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised at how HEAVY this lamp is - it's very solid, not cheaply made. Was also really easy to put together. (Not so fun lugging up the stairs...) I love this lamp, but I wish it had 2 separate controls for the individual lamps, instead of having to cycle thru the settings - it's only a problem if I want to use the "little" lamp while reading and my boyfriend is asleep - I hate disturbing the guy.
customer_reviews.author: JBritt

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp at reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I now own 3 of these. It's a nice lamp, works well and looks more expensive than it is. Base is heavy, be extremely careful not to mis-thread when assembling. They are pretty/decorative and fairly sturdy at a decent price. Again, be careful not to misthread when assembling, it will make the lamp lean/not be as sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult assembly, nice light.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty lamp. Reading portion is nice, lights up the computer area nicely and like the bendable arm. The main light is bright and also works nicely, and the 3 way switch ( large light, small light, both lights at once) works nicely. It was very difficult to assemble. The threading on one portion was quite difficult to connect and required both my husband and adult son. After much effort it is now assembled and upright, working well.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: I Like This Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together. I got it for my 90 year old father, and put this in his living room next to his sofa. The top light takes a regular sized bulb, which it did not come with, but it did come with the smaller bulb for the bottom light. My dad seems happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Reviews were a little mixed but I liked the look of this lamp so I ordered one. Arrived nicely and securely packaged. Love that the reading lamp is adjustable. My husband had no problem at all putting it together. Some reviewers stated it was difficult to thread the wires into the pole pieces and that the lamp does not stand evenly upright and/ or wobbles; thankfully we have neither of these issues. Lamp is sturdy and looks great in our Living Room. The one complaint I can relate to is the on/off switch - it is high up and a bit difficult to twist, other than that I am happy with it. Price is reasonable for the quality. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melmo

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would. It's a piece of junk. The individual pieces that make the stand do not screw together properly and it's so heavy that to return it would cost about 1/3 of what I paid, so just writing it off.
customer_reviews.author: Gilah Pomeranz

customer_reviews.title: Sent me an opened box with missing piece
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize upon ordering that this item was not actually sold by Amazon, but by "Warehouse Deals", meaning that when it arrived with a very shoddily taped original box that had clearly been opened before, I was surprised. Upon opening the box to put the lamp together, I found that the glass lamp shade for the torchere was missing, so I had to return the item. This was a major pain to re-box, due to the poor state of the original box and the heaviness of the lamp base. Not happy that i have to haul this back to the UPS store. I expect more from a seller endorsed by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: V. McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Would order again, but won't have to!
customer_reviews.text: These are coveted by friends and family! Fairly sturdy even with a smaller (and pretty) base. My Mother asked permission to order some after seeing mine. The threading was a bit off on one. We were careful and tried many times to get it to screw together properly...We just sorta forced past the flaw and it looks just right! I like them enough still to give that 5 star review!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Is really nice, I'm giving it 4 stars because the size ...
customer_reviews.text: Is really nice, I'm giving it 4 stars because the size of the bulbs are different, I was expecting them to be de same and only chose a different wattage for each, if needed, but the little lamp needs a small bulb, and I didn't like that, I will have to look for energy saving bulbs in that size, not terrible, but a little annoying for me.
customer_reviews.author: CGA

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The lamp itself is wonderful, however when opening the box, the large too shade was shattered. Finding Normande phone number and leaving a detailed message, as directed, NO ONE RETURNED MY CALL! Fortunately I was able to find my own replacement shade. The lamp is great, however, the customer service is NOT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this lamp. I bought it hoping it would help me when knitting with dark yarn, and it has done that. It brightens up a dark corner I have in my living room and is attractive. I've gotten a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Ann

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but needad to buy a replacement shade
customer_reviews.text: I like it ,but needed to buy a replacement shade!, the screw and nut that hold the shade on the top is not strong enough to hold the frosted glass shade and the shade Broke and fell (lots of splinters/glass) . Amazon did not have a shade to go with it for replacement, so i purchased one from another company, need to buy a screw and nut that will hold the shade! athe ;amp is cool needs upgrades, i need the lamp and can fix it, (my space is limited) amazon is giving me a (partial) refund ! I asked
customer_reviews.author: Steven a ross

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! Based upon some of the reviews, I was worried about the threads and the pieces coming together without a gap yet I had no trouble and it was super easy to assemble -- like in 15 minutes! There is no tilting at all. It looks great and it's stable. Great value for the price. Deciding whether to buy another one for my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara O.

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. It was easy to put together once I read a review that recommended lubricating the parts that screw together. I was careful and patient to have them fit well because the threads are very small and close together. Once that was done, it was easy. It is functional and looks great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ivette

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of problems
customer_reviews.text: It says it is a 100 watt light. I bought the 100 W for this lamp. On arrival the package says 150W. I had a hard time screwing the pole together. The bottom joint would not go on straight no matter how hard I tried. My husband also tried. It left 1/4 inch gap between the poles and it does not stand exactly straight. I needed the lamp now, so could not take the extra time to send it back. Also they give you this little tool to screw down the holder for the inside of the reading lamp. It didn't have the notches to fit into it and so the sharp edges had to be turned by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Powis

customer_reviews.title: Side lamp defective on first one, but great lamp in the end.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received had a defective side light. I wish I had plugged the lamp in and verified both sockets worked before I assembled it. The vendor sent a replacement lamp out right away, and it is working perfectly. Putting the defective lamp back into the packaging was a chore, but the lamp is so pretty and functional that I still think it was worth the effort it took. I took 1 star off for the quality issue; the 2nd (good) one I received would get a 5.
customer_reviews.author: sandyb

customer_reviews.title: A challenge to assemble
customer_reviews.text: When it said "three way" I thought it would support a three-way bulb - at least in the main (upright) socket. But the sockets are both on/off only. The "three-way" refers to one, the other, or both bulbs lit. Still, it is sturdy and though not easy to assemble, the instructions were clear.
customer_reviews.author: Chele Welsh

customer_reviews.title: 40 watt reading lamp is B12 bulb......
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp for the price, we recently purchased, not sure if this is new but but be forewarned that the 40 watt reading lamp is not a regular bulb but a E12 bulb. The lamp does come with a E12 incandescent bulb however if your planning on using LED purchase the appropriate bulb. edit: made an error saying bulb was B12, listed as E12
customer_reviews.author: AZ_Sobo

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: I'be been comparing this one for over a year. Can't beat the price for the quality. Exactly as pictured. A touch of elegance. Great choice! The base is very sturdy, and decorative. the frosted glass only needs occasional rinsing for dust. Easy assembly. I did substitute energy efficient bulbs for both lamps.Not a problem. As far as reviews about the switch being on top~ Not an issue for me as I have a light switch that turns on that wall as long as it is on. Only need to turn for reading lamp. I am extremely pleased with this purchase and would highly recommend. I've looked at similar designs for $200-$300. Giving all 5 stars for appearance, quality, and price.
customer_reviews.author: Chickadee

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packed and intact. Easily put together for this 66 y/o lady. Very sturdy pole and nice heavy base. I have a 100w cfl in torch (it did not come with a torch bulb) and 40w type B (small screw in) Led in reading lamp. It did come with a small 40w regular bulb but I switched it to LED. Switch is at top of light so one must stand up (good for us couch potatoes) to change the setting. Settings are torch, torch and reading or just reading light(s) on. Lights do not individually dim. It is very attractive and I am quite happy with host works and looks.
customer_reviews.author: Delaware1st

customer_reviews.title: Very shoddy construction, flimsy, dysfunctional. See photos. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Non-functional and very poor quality. Clearly made of low quality material with poor quality assurance. Could not be put together. Paint started chipping immediately as I attempted assembly, which was impossible, as the parts could not be aligned. We ordered similar style lamps from Better Homes and Gardens for less money & they're much higher quality. It is shameful that anyone would send sell something like this. I'm returning this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor dad 79

customer_reviews.title: "Love it Love it".
customer_reviews.text: "Love it Love it"... as my mom would say. She has been looking around in stores for a nice one only to find out how pricey and plain they all are. I bought this hoping she would like it and she more than liked it. The decor around the light bulb area is beautiful. The only bad part was it was delivered shattered and so I must blame the delivery company, UPS. I immediately got online and went through the return/damaged process and this took like 3 days. No time at all and seemed very stress free since my mom was anxious to get this up and in use.
customer_reviews.author: darla monica maqueda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and bright
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this lamp for my office because I need lots of light - and this really delivered. It brightens the entire room up, and the reading/side light is a bonus. It was easily put together. The lamp is heavy and of great quality ... this will not be tipping over. The design on the lamp shades give it a nice touch, and could easily go with any room in the house of any decor. I'd definitely get another one, and am even contemplating it : ) I have another floor lamp in my living room that always seems to get loose and rock from side to side, and it probably cost just as much. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny O.

customer_reviews.title: it was pretty easy. It is very heavy and will not ...
customer_reviews.text: When setting up the lamp, it was pretty easy. It is very heavy and will not tip over as some will. The glass top is safer than a plastic shade and will be easier to clean as well. Just remember when you are buying the light bulbs you need a 40 watt reading light bulb not the regular. misleading in the purchasing. One does come with the lamp, but the 100 watt does not and you need to purchase that separately. The regular 40 watt bulbs do not fit the arm lamp. The base of the 40 watt reading bulb is much smaller than a regular 40 watt bulb. I would recommend this lamp to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: margaret goss

customer_reviews.title: Close, but no...
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty lamp and I really do like the detailing, but it was a bit shoddy as far as putting it together. For the price, I'm not surprised, but it was still a bit more "cheap" looking than I'd like. The light it gives off is very soft, which is pleasant, however, I bought this lamp for my office and it is a great lighting aid, but can't really be used to light the office in lieu of the overhead florescents. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: AHB in KC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except for reading lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely sturdy lamp. The upper light is perfect. But the reading lamp takes a only a candelabra bulb! So I bought an adapterso it now takes a regular CLF bulb -- 11Watt (40W equiv)a globe bulb with a soft non-glare light. So now it's useful as a reading lamp. The reading lamp does not have it's own switch. So I've been loosening and tightening the bulb to turn it on and off. Which is easy to do while sitting. With these adjustments it is now a quite satisfactory lovely lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Misfitting tubes
customer_reviews.text: Building this lamp is basically screwing together four metal tubes and then the lamp. One of these tubes is misfits the other in my product, it cannot be fully screwed and I have tried everything including lubricating it. So, the lamp works but the second from the bottom tube is kind of hanging there skewed, not fully screwed and shows it metallic ends rather than the black tube which is neither pretty nor straight.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Clio

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp shame about the E12.
customer_reviews.text: I put a ZigBee bulb in the top - but the side bulb is the small kind. It came with an incandescent bulb which I soon replaced with an LED E12 . I can't find a ZigBee E12 - otherwise I'd buy another one of theses. It did take some effort to get the upright alighned to screw together properly - it came in more sections than expected. the side light shade was difficult until I looked at the instructions and found the handy tightening tool. It's strudy - the shades are glass. Maybe I should give it 4.5.
customer_reviews.author: Kayaker

customer_reviews.title: Design is nice and reading lamp is working (though one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of the for our living room to have more light there. Design is nice and reading lamp is working (though one of the provided lamps got burned within less than a month. Metal leaf scrolls are really adding the "living room" feeling. My main problem is that the light is really cold, almost "deadly" white in my sage-colored room.Will try to find compatible lamps with some yellowish hue.
customer_reviews.author: Alex A.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, sturdy, practical AND pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome lamp for the price. It does what I need. It's a flimsy piece of equipment, so don't expect it to be glamorous, but it's pretty. Needs assembly, but I was able to do it alone and quickly. Heavy, so it is stable. The light is bright enough to be what I wanted. The little "task" light is perfect in my office.
customer_reviews.author: A. Grillo

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE these lamps
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these lamps. We bought 2 for our sitting room. They arrived very quickly and packaged very well. They were pretty easy to put together, there are more pieces than you'd think though. They are surprisingly heavy, VERY sturdy and solid. Good quality product, especially for the price! Highly recommended. I looked around for lamps like these for a few days before finding these. Lamps with a samiliar look elsewhere were generally over $75. Very happy with the quality and price of this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tara F.

customer_reviews.title: A classy addition to the living room.
customer_reviews.text: I selected this lamp to get light to my favorite corner near the fireplace where I knit, read, and do my emails. I decided if it looked too chintzy that I would take it to our cabin in the woods. This lamp far exceeds my expectations. Great lighting and honestly, a very nice look. The photos do not do it justice. I may order a second one for our walkout basement living room. It came packaged so neatly, some of the best packaging I've seen. Because I didn't want to wait for my husband to arrive, I put this lamp together and had it working in about 10 minutes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Product is poor quality. The stand comes in several pieces that ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is poor quality. The stand comes in several pieces that screw together but where it's screwed in is not strong enough so lifting it pulls these parts apart which will then no longer screw together so it will then no longer stand up so it's then unfortunately just junk.
customer_reviews.author: John WArren

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamps
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamps, easy to assemble at an excellent price. Biggest piece of advice, be very a patient when threading the sections together. They can easily be cross threaded, if they don't screw to each other easily by hand it means that the threads are not aligned. Don't force the pieces together, back up and slightly rotate until proper alignment can be made. I experienced difficulty with one tube, it took a little patience but I found the proper alignment. As others have mentioned, do not over tighten, once the pieces bottom out, a light snug will do. Good luck, I got two of them and my wife and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Martin A. Perez

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this lamp. Very easy to assemble with great directions. The add on flexible lamp attached is a great idea makes nice for reading or I keep it on in evening in bedroom to still see but not have full light if I don't need or want full light. The lamp looks and is superb quality. Very happy with this purchase it arrived quickly and as a member Prime member there was no shipping charge.
customer_reviews.author: angie cook

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Looks great. Easy to assemble. I put a 150 W equivalent CFL in the top and a 60W equivalent CFL in the bottom. Soft white so the color temperature is pleasing, the lamp uses very little electricity and the design is quite appealing and the construction sturdy. The goose neck is adjustable and I can't find any fault with this item. I actually have two, one in my music room and the other in my library. I would get a third if I had a spot for it.
customer_reviews.author: Applewhite MinyardTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Shorted out after 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a durable lamp. I've had it for a little over 1 year and the top light has shorted out. I used this lamp on average only twice a week so to have it broken (and a potential fire hazard) after so short a time is extremely disappointing. Don't by this product. I won't likely be buying anything from Normande Lighting in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: illuminates great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. The base is solid and heavy and will keep the lamp well put. The reading light came with a free light bulb (nice touch!) The dome is solid glass and tall enough to completly cover the bulb inside. It stays cool to the touch. This lamp illuminates our large room with cathedral ceiling quite well. For a relaxed atmosphere, I will have to add a dimmer because even a 60 watt bulb is bright!
customer_reviews.author: watertree

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best values I've gotten at Amazon. This floor lamp looks like it cost 3 x what I paid. Heavy, high quality, easy to put assemble. Thanks to one of the reviews warning about Styrofoam mess, I opened and assembled it in the garage and it was a piece of cake.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY M.

customer_reviews.title: Torchiere and reading lamp all in one
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted at the right price. I put it in my bedroom next to a small leather chair and it looks great. Perfect for brightening my whole room and a great reading lamp. It has a lovely leaf and swirl pattern cradling the glass which really add some style. This lamp actually looks black and the base and leaf/swirl design are the only part of the lamp that is brushed and looks bronze colored. As others have reviewed this lamp cannot be dimmed but it does have 3 lighting choices. The quality is good and it was super easy to put together. I have it in my bedroom but it's versatile enough for a living room or den.
customer_reviews.author: A. Valek

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond happy with this purchase. The base of the lamp is very heavy so that lamp is not easily tipped even when bumped (in my case even with rowdy dogs running past it). The lamp was very easy to assemble by one person who is not generally handy and when assembled, no one would guess this is a $50 lamp - it is truly lovely, works perfectly, is built to last, and looks elegant and expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Tango

customer_reviews.title: worked fine. Bought for the reading extension specifically
customer_reviews.text: Put this together with no issues. Plugged it in, worked fine. Bought for the reading extension specifically, when I went to use it today for only the second time, reading light does not come on. I can no longer send back so I'm stuck with a useless light, but hopefully can save someone else the money and aggravation. Junk Junk Junk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: While I love the glass globes they have decorative streaks in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very tall--good for a high ceiling room, but overpowers my small living room. Looks expensive which it is not! On off switch and gooseneck for reading lamp is cheap looking, but not noticebly so. While I love the glass globes they have decorative streaks in the glass which affects the light (which also has a very light shadow of streaks). This makes the reading lamp light uneven, which may disturb some readers. The lightbulbs recommended as "often purchased with this light" will NOT fit the reading lamp. I had to use a 40watt chandelier bulb to fit in the smaller opening. As other reviewers mentioned, the lamp is very heavy and will not tip. I am keeping the light.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Lori

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a very well insulated package. The hardest part was getting it out of the packaging. This is a good thing. Assembly was easy and straight forward, about 5 minutes. It was well built and definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp!
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is beautiful and works perfectly. We were concerned about it when we unpacked as the box it was in was damaged.........and the box that one was in was mangled! Not to worry. All pieces were in perfect shape. We put it together and it works well. Not sure about the issue some have had with the height of the on-off switch; I am short and have no problem with it. I use the reading lamp primarily. Don't pay more for similar lamps in stores. This works well, is beautiful, and actually ended up matching two of my table lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Denise K.

customer_reviews.title: Five stars for great value, appearance and utility
customer_reviews.text: I expected to pay more for a replacement corner/reading light. The heavy wire lamp shell, flat black color with soft gold trim is very appealing. It looks good in my study and provides several lighting options. When reading I use both lights, when using computer I use the top light reflecting off ceiling and when I want max light, I use both. The soft glass does good job distributing light without harsh glare. The item came quickly in solid packing. No damage with excellent packing. I'd rate Normande Lighting at the top as I've bought a few things that did not have best packing!
customer_reviews.author: OldRetiree

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for $50
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp for $50. Easy to assemble. Took about 10 minutes. Looks great. I like that I can either have both lamps on at the same time or one at a time. The only thing I would suggest for improvement would be the on/off switch somewhere lower, maybe on the pole, as I have to stand up to turn on or off. Not that I'm unable to do so but just more convenient as I'm sitting working.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lamp for about 4 months now and we are really enjoying it. I didn't want to spend a ton of money on a lamp right now but I didn't want anything too cheap. This lamp has worked out really well. It has 3 setting options: reading light only, top light only, or both. The reading light is very flexible so you can angle it to whichever position you choose. It's very sturdy and it looks very nice in my living room. I get a lot of compliments on it. It met all my needs; functional, attractive, and affordable. I've been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L. Beachum

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is beautiful and was easy to assemble. I was able to put an LED light in the top part but the small lamp came with an incandescent night light (small socket). I found an LED small socket light but it sticks out a little because it's a chandelier light. I would give this a 5 star if the small light had the standard sized socket.
customer_reviews.author: Treehuger

customer_reviews.title: Good for spare room
customer_reviews.text: This lamp looks good, and the scroll work on the bowl of the lamp is optional. The drawback to this fixture is that there is only one light switch, at the top of the lamp (bottom of the top bowl). I bought this to put next to a bed, but to turn of the light at night I have to get partially out of bed to reach the switch, or pull the lamp toward me in bed to reach it. I've moved it into the spare room because of that, and bought a different lamp for me. PROS: It looks good, assembly was easy. CONS: There is no secondary switch for the bottom light.
customer_reviews.author: Krykie

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, good value, a few minor issues!
customer_reviews.text: Style wise I think this lamp is great. It's got a heavy base, real glass fixtures. Couple of issues, there was some very minor paint chipping on the tubes making up the main shaft. Also the head of the smaller light seems to be a bit too heavy for the metal hose in some positions, it can be hard to set it exactly how you want. Very happy with the lamp over all.
customer_reviews.author: BZ

customer_reviews.title: Cannot find tiny light bulb - do you sell it?
customer_reviews.text: Cannot find the tiny light bulb replacement. When purchased, there was no mention of a "Christmas tree" type bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Carroll, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in person
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is absolutely beautiful in person! It looks very elegant, especially for the price, and the base is very sturdy. It was very easy to put together and I love that the reading lamp is on a gooseneck and can be adjusted. I agree that the on/off switch can be inconvenient since it's high up at the base of the top light. Also it's a little bright for the lighting I would like in the evenings so I'm going to get a cord with a on/off/dimmer switch and then the lamp will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp, but...
customer_reviews.text: Lamp attractive and sturdy, but the reading light has a small socket(Christmas tree bulb size) and I have not found a bulb bright enough for my knitting and reading. I am a senior and need more light for close work. Very disappointed with that problem. small
customer_reviews.author: Joyce D. Pruhs

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to construct but beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: In line with other comments, the screw in pieces are mismatched and it's difficult to put together without making it lean, however I read the comments first, was careful when screwing together and I managed to get it fine on my own with no additional tools (I'm a 28yo female). The base is extremely heavy so would have someone to help you if possible! Once up, the lamp is beautiful and looks much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect floor lamp!!
customer_reviews.text: Lamp was perfect for my small dark dining room. Easy to assemble, took me 10 minutes to put together, not sure why other reviews complained about how difficult it was?? The lamp is made of solid material and not cheap looking at all. Well worth the money and completely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Schloss

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend, I enjoy this light
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this lamp in my family room for several years now, it works like it should. I enjoy the light output from it and the reading light on the side is a nice feature. The only complaint I have is that the reading light takes a weird bulb and seams like I always have to go looking for that, probably more my fault then the light though. I would purchase this item again or recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: James Byrne

customer_reviews.title: I see other customers with their lamps and the leaf accent makes it look very nice. This lamp looks kind of ugly without it
customer_reviews.text: Completely missing upper golden leaf accent in my package. I see other customers with their lamps and the leaf accent makes it look very nice. This lamp looks kind of ugly without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A masterpiece of a lamp
customer_reviews.text: I scoured all the listings at Amazon for a floor lamp and kept coming back to this one because of its high rating and its two lamps which give me the option when used together or separately of three lighting effects. But hands down, what set it apart from everything else is its appearance -- it's beautiful and looks like an expensive lamp. The materials and workmanship are wonderful quality. Why settle for a lamp that just provides light when you can buy one whose design and materials show lovely artistry?
customer_reviews.author: R. W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for a very good price.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp arrived about 2 hours ago in some of the best packaging I've ever seen from Amazon. After we finished lunch, we unpacked it and put it together. Everything was intact and it was a breeze to assemble. Absolutely beautiful, sleek design and exactly what we wanted. Excellent product for a very good price!
customer_reviews.author: NJ Clark

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Looking Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was easy to assemble and looks great. This has a cast iron base (with decorative cover) that makes it stable and straight. I have others that have a plastic sand filled base that refuse to stand straight. The single switch allows whatever light or both to be on.
customer_reviews.author: Big D Little M

customer_reviews.title: DON'T FEAR TO BUY!
customer_reviews.text: The two most common negative reviews are unnecessary. If you TAKE YOUR TIME, to PROPERLY LINE UP the posts, (as others have described), there will be no problem with it being sturdy or stable at all. As to the small reading bulb, they can be found very inexpensive if you just type in 'CANDELABRA' bulb in the Amazon search box. I haven't found a lamp as beautiful, and with Glass shades, at this price anywhere! (Amazon usually is selling it for $51, but frequently reduces it to under $45)
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anthony .......

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is just great, better than expected and I put it together ...
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is just great, better than expected and I put it together in 15 minutes, it was actually more trouble getting it OUT of the box!! :) Love the lighting, gives off just the right amount I needed in the living room......MERCI!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Lamp was very easy to put together and it came with the 40 watt candelabra light bulb. It was wrapped up in a bunch of bubble wrap so I didn't even notice it at first, but it's in there. The 100 watt bulb is not included. It has three settings. First click is for the reader light, second for the top light, third for both lights, forth turns everything off. It's even better looking in person. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: The floor lamp does a dood job of lighting up my room! Love how I can adjust the position of the smaller lamp. Attractive, sturdy and a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Ronsatron

customer_reviews.title: Won't stand straight.  Leans way to one side.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lamp in November 2014. In less than 1 year, the threads for the bottom section of the pole have stripped and the lamp WILL NOT stand straight, but leans over to one side. I will not purchase this lamp again, or any other of this type. I will go for a floor lamp that has a single piece stand pole. I am very disappointed. This was sold by Amazon so the 30 day return date has passed. I would think that items such as this should be warranted for more than 30 days!
customer_reviews.author: Diane J. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Tall Light But Too Bright
customer_reviews.text: This lamp came unharmed in a box. It was a little difficult to assemble, because I am only 5'4". However, once I got it up, it is very pretty. One con though, the lights are too bright with even 40 watt bulbs in each(it suggested 100watt in the top one). I purchased this lamp for my bedroom to use the top light for watching TV and to use the little one for reading. It is still too bright even when only using the "little" light. There's a glare. I've never heard of a 20 watt bulb, but am going to look for one just in case.
customer_reviews.author: NENE

customer_reviews.title: They are gorgeous and I love them so much
customer_reviews.text: I think, from my experience of putting these lamps together, that people who are having problems with the threads are having an issue because they started twisting the posts together without them being straight, and then twisted too hard and are unable to muster up the strength to untwist it. I accidentally did this on one of my lamps, but was able to untwist it and right it. They are gorgeous and I love them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Someone Someone

product_meta.title: Normande Lighting JM1-884 Floor Lamp, Black
product_meta.description:
Normande Lighting 71” Torchiere Floor Lamp with Side Reading Light, 150-Watt Black Floor Lamp with 40-Watt Gooseneck Side Lamp, Rustic Floor Lamp, Vintage Floor Lamp for Living Room or Bedroom

AMAZON.COM


A delightful nod to traditional design, this Normande Lighting lamp (model JM1-884) features a torchiere lamp for full-room illumination as well as a smaller side reading lamp for more focused lighting. It has a Black painted finish, and the two lamps feature frosted glass shades with a leaf and vine motif in wire-metal.

The top torchiere lamp accepts a maximum 100-watt bulb, while the reading light takes a maximum 40-watt bulb (light bulbs not included). A rotary 3-way switch turns on torchiere, reading light, or both. It measures 71 inches tall and 15-1/2 inches wide. Assembly required.

Note: This lamp is not compliant with California Title 24 lighting requirements.

The main precaution, which we have it in the Assembly Instructions is to make sure the post align straight before start screwing them together. Otherwise, you will end up crooked
feature_bullets: 100-watt torchiere floor lamp with 40-watt side reading lamp
Black painted finish; frosted glass shades with wire-metal decor; leaf and vine motif
Rotary 3-way switch turns on torchiere, reading light, or both
Assembly required; incandescent bulbs not included; not CA compliant
Measures 10.7 inches long by 15.5 inches wide by 71 inches high

specifications.Included Components: 40-Watt Side Reading Lamp, Rotary 3-Way Switch Turns On Torchiere, Reading Light, Normande Lighting Jm1-884 71-Inch 100-Watt Incandescent Torchiere Floor Lamp With 40-Watt Side Reading Lamp, 40-Watt Bulb, 100-Watt Bulb, 100-Watt Torchiere Floor Lamp
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,830 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
